quotation.author: Roy D. Chapin, Jr.
quotation.text: Be ready when opportunity comes... Luck is the time when preparation and opportunity meet.

quotation.author: David Dunbar Buick
quotation.text: The failure is the man who stays down when he falls.

quotation.author: Louis Chevrolet
quotation.text: Movement is the universal language of personal freedom.

quotation.author: Walter Chrysler
quotation.text: Every new development, highway, railroad, steamship line, building operation, whether it be a drainage project in old Greece or a new water system in Peru, means an added use of the automobile.

quotation.author: John Francis Dodge
quotation.text: We’re brothers and we always work together…

quotation.author: Henry Ford
quotation.text: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.

quotation.author: Cyrus McCormick
quotation.text: Trying to do business without advertising is like winking at a pretty girl through a pair of green goggles. You may know what you are doing, but no one else does.

quotation.author: Edsel Ford
quotation.text: Father made the most popular cars in the world; I want to make the best..

quotation.author: Walter Chrysler
quotation.text: To me every hour of the day and night is an unspeakably perfect miracle.

quotation.author: John DeLorean
quotation.text: It's inevitable that the company come back.
